heading: How this works
body: Stories are stored as entried in JSON files in "assets/js/stories.en.json" and"assets/js/stories.en.json" for Japanese
They are loaded via ajax, but due to browser security limitation the will only load when running on a server since they are an AJAX call

heading: These are stored a JSON File
body: Paragraphs are separated by commas within the square brackets
